data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: These specifications seem off somehow. We're ____ to ____ these ____ of ____ using ____ nails ____ in ____ kit. But I measured ____, ____ there's a mismatch ____ the ____ and ____ size ____ the ____. Could we be working from the wrong instructions, or do we need to modify them somehow?
data.partBlankContent: These specifications seem off somehow. We're supp____ to jo__ these pie___ of wo__ using t__ nails prov____ in t__ kit. But I measured th__, a__ there's a mismatch bet____ the na___ and t__ size o_ the ho___. Could we be working from the wrong instructions, or do we need to modify them somehow?
data.fullContent: These specifications seem off somehow. We're supposed to join these pieces of wood using the nails provided in the kit. But I measured them, and there's a mismatch between the nails and the size of the holes. Could we be working from the wrong instructions, or do we need to modify them somehow?
data.answer: 不知怎么的，这些说明似乎不太正确。我们应该用工具箱里提供的钉子把这些木头连接起来。但我测量过了，钉子和洞的大小不一致。我们是根据错误的指令工作，还是我们需要修改它们?
